text: Ndithudi! Iwo amene angelo amachotsa moyo wawo pamene ali ochimwa, adzafunsidwa kuti: “Mudali kuchita chiyani?” Iwo adzanena: “Tinali opanda mphamvu ndi oponderezedwa padziko lapansi.” Angelo adzati kwa iwo: “Kodi dziko la Mulungu silinali lotambasuka kuti inu mukadasamuka?” Iwo mudzi wawo ndi Gahena. Malo oipa kwambiri ofikirako
